twoSetSkill.name: Space Enchantment 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Allies take 20% less DMG from frontal attacks. When equipped on Theresa, gain 20% SP.

threeSetSkill.name: Blade of Faith 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Basic ATKs (including Charged and Combo ATKs) of allies gain 15% Physical DMG. Effect does not stack. Theresa equip bonus: Basic ATKs (including Charged and Combo ATKs) further gain 15% Physical DMG.
